text: Alessandro Bruno (born 4 July 1983) is an Italian footballer. He currently plays as a midfielder for Serie D team Casarano. ==Club career== On 23 January 2019 he returned to Pescara after 1.5 years at Livorno. On 29 August 2020 he moved to Casarano. ==References== ==External links== *Career statistics Category:1983 births Category:Sportspeople from Benevento Category:Living people Category:Italian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Serie A players Category:Serie B players Category:Serie C players Category:Benevento Calcio players Category:U.S. Catanzaro 1929 players Category:Vastese Calcio 1902 players Category:Taranto F.C. 1927 players Category:A.S.G.
